item.description: Bright Insight did a concise summary of this news and its potential implications. Worth the watch. Staggering, can you even imagine what an object ten billion tons traveling at 12 miles per second… does to an ice sheet two miles thick. Also consider this article on meteorite strew fields in order to understand that this […]
item.content:encoded:
Bright Insight did a concise summary of this news and its potential implications. Worth the watch. Staggering, can you even imagine what an object ten billion tons traveling at 12 miles per second… does to an ice sheet two miles thick. Also consider this article on meteorite strew fields in order to understand that this event could have had multiple impact sites which could be related to the formation of the Carolina Bays.

The 12,000 Year old Comet that Landed on TEDTalksâ€¦and Erased Ancient Civilization – Greenland Crater

item.title: Updated Site
item.dc:creator: anautonomousagent
item.description: I spent the last few weeks developing a new website with Play Framework. Hosted by Red Hat via Openshift, The Bubble Index now allows anyone to download the most recent PDF on various indices, stocks, currencies, and commodities. However, only about fifty PDF files are published on the website as of January 7th; most are […]
item.content:encoded:
I spent the last few weeks developing a new website with Play Framework. Hosted by Red Hat via Openshift, The Bubble Index now allows anyone to download the most recent PDF on various indices, stocks, currencies, and commodities. However, only about fifty PDF files are published on the website as of January 7th; most are a few months old. I now have all the daily data in the correct format (thanks to the yahoo RUBY GEM and lots of BASH scripts) to be ran through The Bubble Index application. In the next few weeks, I should be able to upload a Bubble Index for all the S&P 500 stocks.
The goal of the site is to host all 500 S&P stocks, 15 major indices, 10 currencies and 10 commodities; which are all updated at least once a week.

item.title: First Post
item.dc:creator: anautonomousagent
item.description: I should post all my miscellaneous explorations within the Internet and Life.  Perhaps they may be of interest to someone. The main topic I wish to post concern all of the books I read. The other topics will be random.  For instance, when I have the desire to purchase various products, I spend a lot […]
item.content:encoded: I should post all my miscellaneous explorations within the Internet and Life.  Perhaps they may be of interest to someone. The main topic I wish to post concern all of the books I read. The other topics will be random.  For instance, when I have the desire to purchase various products, I spend a lot of time in search of reviews. In the process I end up discovering new items and fascinating articles on all sorts of subjects. I hope these findings will be of interest.
